backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, chat messaging, and access control with visibility rules and persistent maps for profiles, verified users, and chat messages.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by initializing an empty verifiedUsers map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file related to UI, hooks, features, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component handling navigation, layout, authentication state, and view switching.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper that blocks access to children until the user is authenticated, showing loading or sign-in prompts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling II login/logout and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/user/VerifiedBad: UI component rendering a small verified badge with an icon.
frontend/src/features/about/AboutPage.ts: Static onboarding page explaining the app, features, and how to get started.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatPage.tsx: Renders chat UI with message list, sending, and admin deletion controls, using hooks for chat queries and author info.
frontend/src/features/chat/useAuthorDisp: Provides hooks to fetch a user's display name and verification status from profile queries.
frontend/src/features/members/MembersPag: Displays the member directory with filtering, admin controls, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileFor: Form for editing and validating user profile fields, including social links and visibility options.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfilePag: Loads the current user's profile and renders the profile form with save handling.
frontend/src/features/profile/validatePr: Validates profile inputs such as display name, bio, links, and public visibility fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Exposes high-level authentication state derived from the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, initialization, login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, chat messages, admin status, member directory, and verification state through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a full light/dark theme using custom OKLCH CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme settings, and additional plugins.
